content:
It dawned on me that it might be cool to publish WASI binaries as one of our releases as well.

Like, running rust-analyzer via wasmer on wasmer's code base would be fun. Not very useful probably though :)
WASI doesn't support threads yet, so it will be hard to port ra.
Hm, yeah, we do need threads pretty badly unfortunately: it's important that compute does not block IO
